00020 #include "LPC17xx.h"                             /* LPC17xx definitions */
00021 #include "ADC.h"
00022 
00023 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024   initialize ADC Pins
00025  *----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00026 void ADC_init (void) {
00027 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00028         /* Using MCB1700 board :
00029          * ADC channel 2 is available
00030          */
00031   LPC_PINCON->PINSEL1 &= ~(3<<18);                   /* P0.25 is GPIO */
00032   LPC_PINCON->PINSEL1 |=  (1<<18);                   /* P0.25 is AD0.2 */
00033 
00034   LPC_SC->PCONP       |=  (1<<12);                   /* Enable power to ADC block */
00035 
00036   LPC_ADC->ADCR        =  (1<< 2) |                  /* select AD0.2 pin */
00037                       (1<< 8) |
00038                       (1<<21);                   /* enable ADC */
00039 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00040   /* Using IAR LPC1768 KickStart board
00041    * ADC channel 5 is available
00042    */
00043    LPC_PINCON->PINSEL3 |=  (3<<30);                   /* P1.31 is AD0.5 */
00044 
00045    LPC_SC->PCONP       |=  (1<<12);                   /* Enable power to ADC block */
00046 
00047    LPC_ADC->ADCR        =  (1<<5) |               /* select AD0.5 pin */
00048                        (1<< 8) |
00049                        (1<<21);                   /* enable ADC */
00050 #endif
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055   start ADC Conversion
00056  *----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 void ADC_startCnv (void) {
00058         LPC_ADC->ADCR &= ~(7<<24);                         /* stop conversion  */
00059         LPC_ADC->ADCR |=  (1<<24);                         /* start conversion */
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064   stop ADC Conversion
00065  *----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 void ADC_stopCnv (void) {
00067         LPC_ADC->ADCR &= ~(7<<24);                         /* stop conversion */
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072   get converted ADC value
00073  *----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 uint32_t ADC_getCnv (void) {
00075   uint32_t adGdr;
00076 
00077   while (!(LPC_ADC->ADGDR & (1UL<<31)));             /* Wait for Conversion end */
00078   adGdr = LPC_ADC->ADGDR;
00079   return((adGdr >> 4) & ADC_VALUE_MAX);          /* read converted value */
00080 }
